data.actual_result: It jumps like 2-3 user size jumps
data.expected_result: It shouldn't jump in the member list
data.short_description: In lazy guilds the member list will randomly do very big jumps while scrolling
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with lazy guild - Try to scroll back and forth in the member list (seems to be happen when you scroll over a role name in the member list)
